responses.content:
```yaml
leads:
  - headline: Argument injection in redcloth_transform
    analysis: |
      The `redcloth_transform` function in `ext/redcloth_scan/redcloth.h` appears to be vulnerable to argument injection.  An attacker may be able to supply input to the application that will be interpreted as command line arguments to a system call.
    cwe: CWE-88
    function_names:
      - redcloth_transform
    filenames:
      - ext/redcloth_scan/redcloth.h
    classification: slightly promising
```

leads.headline: Argument injection in redcloth_transform
leads.analysis: The redcloth_transform function in ext/redcloth_scan/redcloth.h appears to be vulnerable to argument injection.  An attacker may be able to supply input to the application that will be interpreted as command line arguments to a system call.
